title: 781: BITCOIN ON TRACK TO HIT $100K AND GOLD $2K IN 2022 THANKS TO ‘DEFLATIONARY FORCES’ - BLOOMBERG!!
description:
According to Bloomberg, $100,000 Bitcoin (BTC) and $2,000 gold could greet 2022 as global markets face “deflationary forces.”

"$100,000 Bitcoin, $50 Oil, $2,000 Gold? 2022 Outlook in 5 Charts - Peaking commodities and the declining yield on the Treasury long bond point to risks of reviving deflationary forces in 2022, with positive ramifications on Bitcoin and gold."

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit YT channel at: http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
